channel.title: Need Clean Run code
channel.description:
Hello guys and today im posting about my run code. im making a new RSPS called HardcoreScape 2006 and i need to make a webclient. i make the jar file and test it by running it but it dosnt work. i used the .bat run and this happend! [url=http://prntscr.com/qfe2f]run.bat[/url] If someone could help me fix this error that would be really helpful! If you need it here is the code im using
@echo off TITLE Run JAVA -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause
Also if you are interested in join HardcoreScape 2006 follow the links below [url=http://www.hardcorescape.smfnew.com]Website[/url]

item.title: Need Clean Run code
item.dc:creator: @xElite xElite
item.description:
@xElite wrote:

@echo off
TITLE Run
JAVA -Xmx200m client 0 0 highmem members 0
goto run
pause

Change the Xmx500m to something else. Try this^
